resources.string: Your device is not an XPERIA Play!\r\nYou can\'t run this application.
There are no games in the rom directory for Game Boy Advance games. You can load some games using the desktop application provisioned by the ROM in the directory sdcard/GameManager.
Press again the back/circle key again to exit
There are no videos.You can import content from a PC.\r\nFor details, refer to the wiki at (wiki uri here)
There are no images.You can import content from a PC.\r\nFor details, refer to the wiki at (wiki uri here)
There are no tracks.You can import content from a PC.\r\nFor details, refer to the wiki at (wiki uri here)
There are no games.\r\nYou can import content from a PC.\r\nFor details, refer to the wiki at (wiki uri here)
There are no applications.\r\nYou can install new apps from the Play Store.\r\nFor details, refer to the wiki at (wiki uri here)
You haven\'t installed the app \'%s\'.\r\nPlease install it first before continuing.
